summary: The diff implements the requested touch-control layout/styling changes (shoot label to “SHOOT”, neon styling tokens, and described swapped control positions), but also includes several additional UI/theme/debug and utility changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added debug/force flags via URL parameters (e.g., debugControls, forceTouchControls) and related logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to touch control layout/styling; it does not request new debug modes or URL-parameter overrides.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded URL parameter utilities and sessionStorage persistence helpers (storeSessionParameter/getPersistedUrlParameter/etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of requested control layout/styling updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader UI redesign beyond touch controls (menu redesign, HUD refresh, theme system/glass-card effects, neon design tokens).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is touch controls overlay layout/styling only; menu/HUD redesign is outside stated non-goals (“no new gameplay mechanics… beyond presentation/layout changes” applies to controls, not whole UI).

hallucinated_features.description: Canvas renderer changes (devicePixelRatio-aware sizing, neon border, pointer-events disabled on canvas).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; touch control styling/layout can be done without altering the renderer/canvas behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Touch shooting behavior augmented with additional resets on visibility/orientation change.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1/REQ-2 specify no behavior changes beyond presentation; adding new reset triggers is a behavioral change (even if beneficial).
